content: the designer of the elements cal is sandra mcbutton she is known for the popular elements series with the beautiful color gradients ------------------------------ scheepjeswol stonewashed fire size aprox 1 35 m a - 11 x moon stone 801 b - 3 x beryl 833 c - 6 x coral 816 d - 5 x red jasper 807 e - 6 x enstatite 832 -crochet hook f / 4 mm -a darning needle to secure ends -scissors -pins for blocking you will have left over yarn which can be used to enlarge the border or make matching pillows this pattern is 70 pages with photos ------------------------------ a free video tutorial can be found here 1 1 https //www youtube com/playlist list=plcznkeb9vzy34hbbsvbsnec6trzlminta note no refunds or cancellation on digital items by clicking the buy it now or add to cart button you expressly agree to purchase and understand that the digital pattern is immediately available for download and you do not have the right to cancel or refund once the download has started
